articles.description: Natasha Reddican couldn’t find work after the show ended in June 2019 following the high-profile death of a guest
articles.content:
A woman who worked on the Jeremy Kyle show took her own life after the notorious programme was axed, an inquest has heard. 
 Former producer, Natasha Reddican, couldnt find work after the show ended… [+4750 chars]
